artist: Artist: Adolphe Theodore Jules Martial Potémont; Printer: Auguste Delâtre; Publisher: Cadart & Luquet, Paris
creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: canal with arcing bridge of wrought iron and brick in middle ground; paved brick walkways on either side of canal; boats in distance; trees beyond bridge on both side of waterway, with buildings; a few pedestrians
inscription:
Title and Inscription

LLC below image, printed in black: [A. Martial sculpt.]; bottom center below title, printed in black: [Paris, Publié par A. CADART & LUQUET, Éditeurs, 79, Rue Richelieu.]; LRC below image, printed in black: [Imp. Delâtre, Rue St. Jacques, 303, Paris.]
provenance: Dr. Gabriel and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis
signed: bottom center, printed in black: [LE CANAL ST. MARTIN.]
title: Le Canal St. Martin
